stories.text:
I am currently actively looking for a software developer role and I seriously need to improve my resume. I feel it does not read well for someone with 20 years software development experience like myself.

Would love to get some constructive criticism so I can refactor my resume so I can get better results.

https://godev.substack.com/p/golang-developer
stories.title: Ask HN: Please critic my full stack developer resume

stories.text:
I lack the possibility to sort pull requests on time of merge in GitHub. Let's make them aware. Please go here:

https://support.github.com/contact?tags=dotcom-footer

Send the following message:

```

Subject: Sort pull request by time of merge

```

And message:

```

Dear GitHub,

thank you for a great service!

Your service is something I use everyday in my job. There is one feature that is lacking that would be an easy fix for you. It would make my (and I believe many other developers) life easier.

*Please make it possible to sort closed pull request by time of merge!*

Best regards, <YOUR NAME>

```

Let's cross our fingers!
stories.title: Sort pull requests by time of merge [GitHub]
The flux capacitor was invented on this day in 1955
